snippet: The 2012 Games have been great for embraces, from Gabrielle Douglas and Coach Liang Chow to Misty May-Treanor and Kerri Walsh Jennings.
abstract: The 2012 Games have been great for embraces, from Gabrielle Douglas and Coach Liang Chow to Misty May-Treanor and Kerri Walsh Jennings.

headline.main: At the Games, a Whole Lot of Hugs
